item.title: Thoughts on Bioelectricity and Qi
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_1346" align="alignright" width="300" caption="Not So Nice Duck on Flickr"][/caption]

I've been reading Bill Bryson's A Short History of Nearly Everything lately, and it has set my brain off on several crazy trips into hypothetical imaginings. For example, did you know that every cell in your body converts the chemical energy it absorbs into tiny amounts of electrical energy? There are electric charges racing around every one of the 10,000 trillion cells in your body.
